description: Whether you scoop this onto a toasted semolina hero roll for a sandwich, or serve it straight from the pan with garlic bread on the side, meatball Parmesan makes a filling, savory meal You can form the meatballs up to a day ahead and keep them in the fridge until you’re ready to fry But they are best fried just before baking
title: Meatball Parmesan
text:
Whether you scoop this onto a toasted semolina hero roll for a sandwich, or serve it straight from the pan with garlic bread on the side, meatball Parmesan makes a filling, savory meal. You can form the meatballs up to a day ahead and keep them in the fridge until you’re ready to fry. But they are best fried just before baking. Serve this with some kind of crisp green vegetable on the side.
Featured in: Parm Dishes To Warm Weary Souls .
